label: 道円
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: 1.  Lay priest, Yamada Akinaga's adopted son, = Rōen (?)  2. Yamada Shigetsugu (1191-1221), son of Yamada Shigetada, slain with his father in Jōkyū war (p. 291). [山田明長、山田重継、山田重忠、承久の乱]
